name: Even if Tempest: Dawning Connections
storyline:
“Fate's final verdict, illuminated by love.”

At the edge of despair, the flower of hope begins to bloom...

When death stole her last breath, the girl reached for the witch's hand.

She did it to change herself after being deceived and despised.
To get revenge on the detestable people that scorned her.

But in the end, what she wished for
was neither power nor honor... but love.
summary: A sequel for Even if Tempest. The story paints a rich, hopeful picture of the days the protagonists share after the main story.
